(2) Your mother wakes you up

1.content:
You sit and squirm in your seat. The other passengers on the bus watch your discomfort with amusement. They know that you desperately need to pee.

It seems like this bus driver is never going to stop so you can use the toilet. Soon, the pressure becomes too much and you begin to wet your pants.

Everyone, already looking at you, knowing what was coming, laughs as they watch the dark patch appear on the crotch of your jeans and begin to grow.

[Roll a die]
1.title: A Strange Dream

choices: Read a book
Listen to your MP3 player
Ask Susan which school she will be going to
Ask Susan if she is looking forward to staying with her Aunt
Try to start a conversation about last year at school
11.content:
You suddenly wake up. The first thing you do is reach down under the covers to check. No, luckily your accident was only in the dream. Your pajamas and sheets are still dry.

"What a strange dream" you say to yourself but try to forget about it as you shower and get ready. You do have a long bus ride ahead of you today and you hope that the dream was in no way prophetic.

"Good morning Daniel." your mother greets you. "Breakfast is almost ready."

You eat and say goodbye to your father as he leaves for work then your mother drives you to the bus station. After a long embarrassing hug goodbye she lets you climb into the bus.

You start walking down the aisle when you recognise one of the passengers. Susan was in your class at school and you had a bit of a crush on her. "Hi Daniel." she waves to you. "I wasn't expecting you see anyone from our class on this bus."

"Hi Susan." you reply. "Are you going to school in the city too."

"Yeah. I'm going to stay with my aunt." she says. "Come sit next to me. It'll be good to have someone to talk to."

You try to hide your excitement at the idea and, as casually as you can, sit in the seat next to her.

Soon, the driver starts the bus and you wave to your mother as you leave the station.

[What do you do?]
11.title: (1) You wake up

choices: (1-2) Susan asks you what you're reading
(3-4) Susan takes out her own book
(5-6) Susan takes out her MP3 player

You smile back at her. "Maybe I'll try this year."

"You should." She says. "You'll have fun. I promise."

The conversation flow easily but you soon begin to feel pressure on your bladder. You hope that the bus driver will stop soon.

"Are you okay?" Susan notices you fidgeting in your seat.

"I really need to use the toilet." you say.

"I'm sure the driver will have to stop soon for petrol." she reassures you.

[Roll a die]
12533.title: Try to start a conversation about last year at ...

choices: Put the sheets in the wash
Hide the wet sheets and replace them
Get into the shower
Call for your mother to help
Go find your mother
13.content: You suddenly wake up. The first thing you do is reach down under the covers to check. Oh no! You really did wet yourself. Your pajamas and sheets are soaked.
13.title: (3) You wake up and discover that you've wet...

choices: (1 or 2) You make it to the laundry without being seen
(3 or 4) Your mother catches you on the way to the laundry
(5 or 6) Your father catches you on the way to the laundry
131.content:
You strip the bed and bundle up all of the wet sheets. As you carry them out of the room you see that there is still a large wet mark on the mattress but there's nothing you can do about that at the moment.

[Roll a die]
131.title: Put the sheets in the wash

choices: Go have a shower
Throw your pajamas in too and go have a shower
Return to your room and do something about the mattress
1311.content: The hallway is clear and you quickly run to the laundry, drop the wet sheets into the washing machine and start it.
1311.title: (1 or 2) You make it to the laundry without bei...

choices: (1 to 4) You get to the shower without beign seen
(5 or 6) Your mother catches you on the way to the bathroom
13111.content:
Still in your wet pajamas, you head back into the corridor on your way to the bathroom.

[Roll a die]
13111.title: Go have a shower

choices: (1) You finish your shower and quickly clean up the evidence of your accident
(2 to 4) Mom walks in the bathroom and sees your soiled underwear on the floor
(5 to 6) You finish and go back to your room, only to find your mom waiting
133.content:
You feel gross and can't think of doing anything else besides getting out of your soaked pajamas and underwear and taking a long shower to wash away the shameful evidence of your babyish accident.

You strip off your soaked pajamas, feeling humiliated as you look at your pee stain completely covering the front of your pajama pants, now on the floor. You notice that even your pajama shirt is very wet from your accident, further adding to your embarrassment.
You quickly walk to the bathroom in your now yellowed tighty-whiteys, as they still drip thin beads of rapidly chilling pee down your legs.
You leave your soaked underwear on the bathroom floor and enter the shower, quickly cleaning up.

[Roll a die.]
133.title: Get into the shower

choices: (1 or 2) Your father walks in instead of your mother
(2 to 6) Your mother hears you calling and walks in
134.content:
You're really scared & don't know what to do.
You feel like a baby lying in a wet bed in soaked pajamas. The feeling of wetness clinging to you must have reawakened more babyish instincts as you find yourself calling for you mother for help.

"Mom!" "Mom!" You shout, not really crying but clearly upset just like a little kid unable to make it to the potty but who was too old to have had an accident, forever damaging his status as a "big boy".

[Roll a die]
134.title: Call for your mother to help

choices: (1 or 2) You find your mother
(3 or 4) Your father sees you
(5 or 6) You find your mother and father together
135.content:
You get up and leave your room in search of your mother.

[Roll a die]
135.title: Go find your mother

choices: (1 or 2) Your father is at the table
(3 or 4) Your mother and father are at the table
(5 or 6) Your father has left for work
1353.content:
Down the corridor, you see your mother in the living room. You walk down to her.

"Mom." you say, quietly, as you step into the living room.

As she turns, your father steps in from the kitchen. "You've wet yourself?" He observes.

Your mother reacts a moment later. "Oh dear. Are you feeling okay? You'd better get into the shower." She rushes you away before your father can say anything else.

"Did you wet the bed?" She asks.

You nod.

"Okay dear." She says, turning on the shower. "You clean up and I'll take care of your bed."

You have a long shower, hoping that your father will leave for work before you come out. When you eventually return to your room the bed has been stripped, however a large wet mark remains on the mattress. You try to ignore it as you get dressed.

"Hurry up and have your breakfast." your mother calls to you.

You reluctantly do as you are told.

[Roll a die]
1353.title: (5 or 6) You find your mother and father together

choices: Say yes
Say no
13533.content:
You are relieved to find that your father isn't at the table when you get there.

"Your father had to leave for work." your mother explains.

That means you won't see him for almost 3 months. Hopefully he's forgotten about this by then.

As you eat breakfast, your mother asks. "Do you want to talk about your accident?"
13533.title: (5 or 6) Your father has left for work

choices: Put it on to be safe
Grab your stuff and leave without putting it on
135332.content:
That was the last thing you wanted. You say no and your mother appeared to drop it. "Go get your stuff" your mother says.

You walk to your room to grab your suitcase. Looking at your bed you notice something...

There was a pull up. It must have been one from your younger sister, as it was a pink princess pullup.

Obviously your mom was dropping a hint. You could put it on and wear it for the trip, which may be the safe bet according to your dream, however, you do not want to wear a pullup in public.
135332.title: Say no

choices: Tell her about your dream
Say that you think you are stressed about moving to the city
Insist that it won't happen again
Say that you don't know why you wet the bed
Tell her that you don't want to talk about it
14.content:
"Daniel" you are woken by your mother. "Wake up, are you feeling alright?"

"Yeah." you mumble as you become aware of your surroundings. "What's wrong?"

"You've wet the bed." she says, pulling back your sheets.

The cold air hits your wet pajamas, snapping you quickly to full consciousness "What?" you sit up and look at the large wet stain around your bottom.

"Go have a shower." she says. "I'll take care of this."

You leave your mother to deal with your wet sheets and make your way across the hall to the bathroom. After removing your wet pajamas, you get into the shower.

When you return to your room the bed has been stripped, however a large wet mark remains on the mattress. You try to ignore it as you get dressed.

You eat breakfast with your parents. There is, fortunately, no mention of your accident. Then your father leaves for work, wishing you luck at your new school.

"Do you want to talk about this morning?" Your mother finally asks.
14.title: (4) Your mother discovers that you've wet t...

choices: Say yes
Say no
Say that you don't know
141.content:
"I don't really know what happened." you say. "I had a really weird dream. I was on the bus to the city and really needed to pee but the driver wouldn't stop."

"And then you had an accident?" she asks.

You nod. "Just before you woke me up."

"Are you worried about this happening again?" your mother asks. "At Ms Thompson's house?"
141.title: Tell her about your dream

choices: Let her buy some bedwetter pants
Let her buy a plastic sheet
Don't let her buy either
1411.content:
"Yes." you admit. "A little."

"Maybe you should wear something under your pajamas." she suggests. "For the first few nights, just to be safe."

"Like a diaper?" you ask, shocked at the suggestion. Although after your accident you aren't certain it's such a crazy idea.

"No." she shakes her head. "There are special underpants for kids who wet the bed. They just have a little extra padding that absorbs any accidents."

"That sounds a lot like a diaper." you say.

"Well I could get a plastic sheet for you to put on the bed." she says. "It won't keep you dry but it will keep Ms Thompson's matress from getting ruined."
1411.title: Say yes

choices: Wait in the car
Go into the chemist with her
14111.content:
"Okay." you agree. "That might be a good idea."

On the way to the bus station your mother stops at a chemist to buy the special underpants. "You can wait in the car if you like."
14111.title: Let her buy some bedwetter pants

choices: Fess up and ask if you can go change
Aviod eye contact and don't talk.
141111.content:
You wait in the car for a few minutes until your mom comes back out side with a bag. " They were low on supply and only had girls training pants." your mom says trying to be considerate. She packs the pull-ups into your back pack and drives you to the bus. You stop at a rest aren't and run into a family bathroom with your backpack. You get inside and open your bag to find a pink and white Disney princess diaper (http://farm5.staticflickr.com/4094/54160...). You feel so embarrassed as you pull the training pants on and put your pants on over them.

As you walk the pull-ups make loud crinkle notice and you are bright red in embarrassment. After thirty minutes of bus rude you start to feel your critch grow warm. You wet yourself. The rest of trip is bothersome because of your fluffed out cold pull-up. You arrive and are greeted by Ms. Thomson waiting for you. You load your bag in the back before going on a drive with your new guardian. You don't talk very much as Ms. Thomson dominates the conversation talking about her daughters. She brings up that her youngest daughter, Sarah, who is 6 struggles with bed wetting and has to wear protection sometimes. You wonder if your mother had told her about your "accident". After stopping at a redlight Ma. Thomson sniffs the air and turns to you.
141111.title: Wait in the car

choices: (1 or 2) She drops the subject
(3 or 4) She calls Ms Thompson to warn her that you might wet the bed
(5 or 6) She decides that you can't move in with Ms Thompson
145.content:
"No." you say, shaking your head. It's too embarrassing to think about.

"What if you have an accident like this while you're living with Ms Thompson?" she asks.

"I don't want to talk about it." you say.

[Roll a die]
145.title: Tell her that you don't want to talk about it

choices: Let her home-school you
Insist that you won't wet the bed again
Tell her she's being ridiculous and storm back to your room
1453.content:
"Well if you're going to be wetting the bed I don't think you should stay with Ms Thompson." she decides. "I can't have you ruining her mattresses."

"What?" you ask. "Then where am I going to go to high-school?"

"I'll home-school you if I have to." She says.
1453.title: (5 or 6) She decides that you can't move in...

choices: Go out
Stay in your room
14533.content:
"You're being ridiculous!" you shout and storm back to your room, slamming the door.

The wet stain that started this is still there on your mattress. You try not to look at it.
14533.title: Tell her she's being ridiculous and storm b...

choices: (1) You wake up
(2) Your mother wakes you up
(3) You wake up and discover that you've wet the bed
(4) Your mother discovers that you've wet the bed and wakes you up
(5 or 6) The dream continues
15.content:
A woman at the front of the bus stands and makes her way toward you with a large bag on her shoulder. "Leave the poor baby alone." She tells the rest of the passengers. Then she asks you. "What is your name little boy?"

"Daniel." you answer.

"Hello Daniel." She says, as though you were a small child "Where's your mommy?"

"I'm traveling by myself" You inform her. "I'm going to live with my mother's friend so that I can go to high-school in the city."

"You're far too little for that." She tells you. "Why don't you have your diaper on?"

"I don't wear diapers." you insist. "I'm not a baby."

"Don't be silly." She says, taking you by the hand and leading you to the back of the bus, where you find the back seat empty.

She pulls a plastic mat out of her bag and unfolds it onto the long seat. Next, she unfastens your jeans and pulls them down, along with your underpants. "Lay down on the mat."

[Roll a die]
15.title: (5 or 6) The dream continues

choices: Tell her that you had a strange dream
Tell her you're nervous about moving to the city
Tell her that nothing is wrong
151.content:
You suddenly wake up. "What a strange dream" you say to yourself but try to forget about it as you shower and get ready. You do have a long bus ride ahead of you today and you hope that the dream was in no way prophetic.

"Good morning Daniel." your mother greets you. "Breakfast is almost ready."

You can't seem to stop thinking about your dream.

She must have noticed because she asks "Are you alright? You seem very quiet this morning."
151.title: (1) You wake up

choices: Tell her it was about the bus ride to the city
Tell her you don't really remember
Tell her that you don't want to talk about it
1511.content:
"I just had a strange dream." You say. "That's all"

"Really?" She seems interested. "What was it about?"
1511.title: Tell her that you had a strange dream

choices: Tell her that you wet your pants in the dream
Tell her that nothing happened
15111.content:
"It was about the bus ride to the city." you say. "That's all"

"And what happened?" She continues questioning.
15111.title: Tell her it was about the bus ride to the city

choices: (1 or 2) You wake up
(3 or 4) Your mother wakes you up
(5 or 6) The dream continues
155.content:
You do as you are told and lay on the plastic mat.

The woman takes a disposable diaper out of her bag and unfolds it before sliding it under you bottom. Next, she pulls the front of the diaper up firmly between your legs, then the sides up around your hips and fastens the tapes. "All done." She declares. "Now you don't have to worry about any more accidents."

Taking you by the hand, she leads you back to where she had been sitting at the front of the bus. Everyone else's eyes follow you as you make your way up the aisle, dressed in only a t-shirt and diaper.

[Roll a die]
155.title: (5 or 6) The dream continues

choices: (1 or 2) You wake up.
(3 or 4) She shows you a baby boy's nursery.
(5 or 6) She shows you a baby girl's nursery.
1553.content:
You sit down next to the woman and she sticks a pacifier into your mouth. "Now be a good baby for mommy."

The bus finally reaches your destination and the woman retrieves a stroller from the luggage compartment under the bus. Then she says. "Come on little one let's go home."

You try to protest that you are meant to meet someone at the station but only mange to mumble around the pacifier as she clips you into the seat of the stroller and pushes you out of the bus terminal.

Unlike the passengers on the bus, the people on the street act as though there is nothing unusual about you being diapered and pushed along in a stroller. One even comments to the woman "What a sweet little baby you have."

You finally arrive at the woman's house. She releases you from the stroller and leads you inside. "Let's go see your new room."

[Roll a die]
1553.title: (5 or 6) The dream continues

choices: (1 to 4) You wake up.
(5 or 6) The dream contnues.
15533.content:
She shows you into a nursery. It has a cot and a changing table, all big enough for you. It takes you a moment to realise but when you do you manage to spit out the pacifier. "This is a girl's room." you complain. "Everything is pink."

"Yes sweetie." The woman says. "You're going to be my little girl."

"But I'm a boy." you insist.

"Not any more." she says sweetly. "Now let's get you into a nice pretty dress before the party."

She pulls your t-shirt off over your head and goes to the wardrobe, soon returning with a pink dress. "Arms up." she directs as she dresses you. "Much better. Now let's go show off your new dress to all of your friends.

[Roll a die]
15533.title: (5 or 6) She shows you a baby girl's nursery.

choices: (1-4) You wake up
(5-6) The dream continues
155332.content:
She took you to the next room. It looked like daycare but there were every of your classmates, dressed like babies and playing. She sat you on the floor.
"Now, be good baby and play nicely with other little ones." she said kissing your room. You tried to stand up but fell on your butt. You tried few more times but without effort. Then understood you cannot do anything and started crawling like baby. One girl of your class, Sarah, crawled over wearing pink onesie and suckling pacifier.
"Wanna pway wif me?"
155332.title: (5 or 6) The dream contnues.

info.brief_description: A diaper story which uses dice rolls for random events
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

This story is based on the "Move in with your mother's friend" path in Changes: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1690111-Changes

You take on the role of Daniel, a boy about to start high-school. Unfortunately your home town is too small to have a high-school so your parents have decided that you will move in with your mother's friend, Ms Thompson, who lives in the city.

*****PLEASE NOTE (Especially if you are adding chapters)*****
There are two types of decisions in this story:

The first are choices which Daniel (the reader) can make.

For example: It is still 15 minutes to recess but the pressure on your bladder is almost too much.
[What do you do?]
1) Try to hold on.
2) Ask for permission to go to the toilet.

The second are events outside of Daniel's control. These can be either random events or decisions other characters make. These are decided by rolling a normal 6-sided die (or use http://www.random.org/dice/?num=1 if you don't have one handy).

For example: You decide to hold on until recess but as time drags on you begin to doubt that you'll make it that long.
[Roll a die.]
(1 to 4) You manage to hold on until recess.
(5 or 6) You wet yourself.

Another Example: You raise your hand and ask for permission to go to the toilet.
[Roll a die.]
(1 to 3) The teacher lets you go.
(4 to 6) The teacher tells you to wait until recess.
